","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"canFund","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"totalPayed","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"donors","outputs":[{"name":"funded","type":"uint256"},{"name":"refunded","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"fund","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"value","type":"uint256"},{"name":"grantee","type":"address"}],"name":"approveRefund","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"totalRefunded","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"currency","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"name":"toCheck","type":"address"}],"name":"isManager","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"targetFunding","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"pendingPayments","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"totalFunding","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"name":"_grantees","type":"address[]"},{"name":"_amounts","type":"uint256[]"},{"name":"_manager","type":"address"},{"name":"_currency","type":"address"},{"name":"_targetFunding","type":"uint256"},{"name":"_fundingExpiration","type":"uint256"},{"name":"_contractExpiration","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"constructor"},{"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"fallback"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"support","type":"bool"},{"indexed":true,"name":"signaler","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"name":"token","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"LogSignal","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[],"name":"LogFundingComplete","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[],"name":"LogGrantCancellation","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"donor","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"LogFunding","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"donor","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"LogRefund","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"grantee","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"LogPayment","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"grantee","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"LogPaymentApproval","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"totalRefunded","type":"uint256"}],"name":"LogRefundApproval","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@NoahMarconi @ameensol @JFickel @ArnaudBrousseau\r","details":"Grant request, funding, and management.\r","methods":{"approvePayout(uint256,address)":{"details":"Approve and make payment to a grantee.\r","params":{"grantee":"Recipient of payment.\r","value":"Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.\r"}},"approveRefund(uint256,address)":{"details":"Approve refunding a portion of the contract's available balance.\r     Refunds are split between donors based on their contribution to totalFunded.\r","params":{"grantee":"Grantee address to reduce allocation from.\r","value":"Amount to refund.\r"}},"availableBalance()":{"details":"Get available grant balance.\r","return":"Balance remaining in contract.\r"},"canFund()":{"details":"Funding status check.\r","return":"true if can fund grant.\r"},"cancelGrant()":{"details":"Cancel grant and enable refunds.\r"},"constructor":{"details":"Grant creation function. May be called by grantors, grantees, or any other relevant party.\r","params":{"_amounts":"Respective allocations for each Grantee (must follow sort order of _grantees).\r","_contractExpiration":"(Optional) Date after which payouts must be complete or anyone can trigger refunds.\r","_currency":"(Optional) If null, amount is in wei, otherwise address of ERC20-compliant contract.\r","_fundingExpiration":"(Optional) Date after which signaling OR funds cannot be sent.\r","_grantees":"Sorted recipients of unlocked funds.\r","_manager":"(Optional) Multisig or EOA address of grant manager.\r","_targetFunding":"(Optional) Funding threshold required to release funds.\r"}},"fund(uint256)":{"details":"Fund a grant proposal.\r","params":{"value":"Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.\r"},"return":"Cumulative funding received for this grant.\r"},"remainingAllocation(address)":{"details":"Grantee specific check for remaining allocated funds.\r","params":{"grantee":"'s address.\r"}},"signal(bool,uint256)":{"details":"Voting Signal Method.\r","params":{"support":"true if in support of grant false if opposed.\r","value":"Number of signals denoted in Token GRAINs or WEI.\r"},"return":"True if successful, otherwise false.\r"},"withdrawRefund(address)":{"details":"Withdraws portion of the contract's available balance.\r     Amount donor receives is proportionate to their funding contribution.\r","params":{"donor":"Donor address to refund.\r"},"return":"true if withdraw successful.\r"}},"title":"Grants Spec Contract.\r"},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/D/grant-contracts/contracts/Grant.sol":"Grant"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/D/grant-contracts/contracts/AbstractGrant.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdfbee8fa1dddd8cd642416595716c1a38c24694a443e0298c943fd03063f8fdd","urls":["bzzr://2ca2544f1c2fb587ab35717de0d4b10fa20dbdd059dd6dc705f5f1d3a7279e7b","dweb:/ipfs/QmXWQwGJrPhd6QDbcQFquAxhxFGjhrxsppLZEJpyPTYtUX"]},"/D/grant-contracts/contracts/Grant.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb3d43995a24eccd8dac4e5b315104f7a3bbf4bfb8aaf99ab393cee1d140951a8","urls":["bzzr://ce8423c083e353422acb8d97d51d0161dc8d520d79d4c1a6bd5d98b611b299ab","dweb:/ipfs/QmTRnU1Mm4z61yYADiZ3dvGHkqyuogLsW1Y3F65NzLhbFp"]},"/D/grant-contracts/contracts/ISignal.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7b70cbab1e25b7390656be9ad4046b9bd745cc492f5ff06b7b91405e4a02569e","urls":["bzzr://7c3811fe2565c5fb7b083f3e79ba53bdd9ef36fc1c81932b30d6125deef11ff8","dweb:/ipfs/QmNi37CnhP2n6dLPgM2A96NkvG1LgKq5uBavviKNpd1RE7"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ccf2d7b51873db1ccfd54ca2adae5eac3b184f9699911ed4490438419f1c690","urls":["bzzr://1604f5b6d6e916c154efd8c6720cda069e5ba32dfa0a9dedf2b42e5b02d07f89","dweb:/ipfs/QmV3yVktya1s617QmuzQR2CfuJgUi3dR2xEZY9ecmqZ2G1"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x90e8c2521653bbb1768b05889c5760031e688d9cd361f167489b89215e201b95","urls":["bzzr://aa8b45b57edafc3d67bc5d916327ea16807fae33f753ca163ae0c4061b789766","dweb:/ipfs/QmP5NaEwZthQeM2ESz4WTT3osrP7jhbvu7ocbttBi2JAw6"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0441ff2b36d503f3a29d28d3754291f119064f4973d5c780698143d919037a78","urls":["bzzr://d26b514ac785d2a74a903067d051b34541e86a7fc63b782bb39d3a576d8eb4da","dweb:/ipfs/QmcMMjZceFepXgRrzSx577oWwt7SCSFzoqZiTF7tTxquF7"]}},"version":1}

approvePayout(uint256,address).details: Approve and make payment to a grantee.

params.value: Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.

approveRefund(uint256,address).details: Approve refunding a portion of the contract's available balance.     Refunds are split between donors based on their contribution to totalFunded.

params.grantee: Grantee address to reduce allocation from.

constructor.details: Grant creation function. May be called by grantors, grantees, or any other relevant party.

params._amounts: Respective allocations for each Grantee (must follow sort order of _grantees).
params._contractExpiration: (Optional) Date after which payouts must be complete or anyone can trigger refunds.
params._currency: (Optional) If null, amount is in wei, otherwise address of ERC20-compliant contract.
params._fundingExpiration: (Optional) Date after which signaling OR funds cannot be sent.
params._manager: (Optional) Multisig or EOA address of grant manager.
params._targetFunding: (Optional) Funding threshold required to release funds.

params.value: Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.

fund(uint256).return: Cumulative funding received for this grant.

remainingAllocation(address).details: Grantee specific check for remaining allocated funds.

params.support: true if in support of grant false if opposed.
params.value: Number of signals denoted in Token GRAINs or WEI.

withdrawRefund(address).details: Withdraws portion of the contract's available balance.     Amount donor receives is proportionate to their funding contribution.
